parameters: It's an ATM! Let's withdraw some money!
No, I've never saved money before.

I thought so, if Memerisu-chan had savings, I'd think she
was an imposter♪

Hey there. You looking for a part-time job? Then, I'm gonna
grab some food, so please mind the store for me!
Weeeng. The sound of something dropping...
Hey, how much for that shield?
That much for a shield?! You're ripping me off here!!
A points card...? Is this it?
\c[17]Ah, that points card isn't valid here... I apologize.

What the heck! Are you guys making fun of me?! I'm
leaving!!!
\c[31]Thank you very much.\c[17]Thank you very much.
You're tired, huh~ Here's your pay for the part-time job.

The aroma of scorched garlic oil and super delicious green
onion oil is wafting from this frozen fried rice!! It's
making me so hungry...!!
If you keep eating stuff like that, you'll gain weight!

The aroma of scorched garlic oil and super delicious green
onion oil is wafting from this frozen fried rice!! It's
making me so hungry...!!
If you keep eating stuff like that, you'll gain weight!

Garlic oil with a hint of char and super delicious green
onion oil flavor this frozen fried rice!! It's so
appetizing...!!
If you keep eating stuff like that, you'll gain weight!
